timeline.message:
Fix sonar smell: JUnit assertTrue/assertFalse should be simplified to the corresponding dedicated assertion

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

Fix sonar issue: "static" base class members should not be accessed via derived types

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

Fix sonar smell: Collection.isEmpty() should be used to test for emptiness

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

Fix sonar smell: Methods should not be empty

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: You delete it without replacing it by assertNotNull, is it what you wanted to do?
timeline.author: MioRtia

replies.bodyText: Do you really think this test is interesting? I can revert this change if you consider it's useful
replies.author: mathbagu

timeline.author: MioRtia
